entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text: @OliverDowden But this isn't the story. Now it's, why, after undermining public trust in the regs & risking loss of life through the public following Cummings'example, could Johnson not sack an adviser who should never become the story. Unless it deflects from🌏's worst Covid-19 deaths?
